title: Create an Infographic from Data
description: A data journalist has a spreadsheet of complex data and needs to create a simple, clear infographic to help readers understand the key findings.

tasks.description: Analyze the spreadsheet to identify the most important data points or trends to visualize.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the key message that the infographic should convey.

tasks.description: Choose the best type of chart or visual representation for the data (e.g., bar chart, map, pie chart).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects a chart type that accurately and clearly represents the data.

tasks.description: Use an infographic creation tool to design the visual, applying the publication's branding and style.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a professional and informative infographic.
